title: Repository Gate: Terminal Exception Gate
body: PRIORITY 0 REPO RULE: Terminal Exception Gate - All blocking terminal preconditions must be false. Logic: !(toolExists || genericPossible || losesAudit || gitToolExists || priorReplaced). If any tool path is available, terminal access is blocked. Failure action: BLOCK with message 'Terminal blocked: tool path available.' This gate must be evaluated before any terminal access.
